description: old building in ruins; plants growing at tops; figures of people and animals in center foreground are very dark; walking figure right foregrond and two talking figures left foreground visible; letters on or above various parts of building
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate in black: [Tav II/ DEL CASTELLO DELL\' AQUA GIULIA   Piranesi F.]; various capital letters of the alphabet in or above image in black
portfolio: From Plate II from "Le Rovine del Castello dell' Acqua Giulia"
title: Del Castello Dell' Acqua Giulia
